resources.string: No Internet connectivity but you will receive SOS calls
when user travel this speed onwards inform me in the reports
After user wait this amount of time inform me in the report
Enable \'open app button\' instead of just showing coordinate
Select a child from top slider or add your first child from the selection slider above

string-array.name: help_tour
string-array.item: On bottom navigation show 3 quick action buttons
Refresh button refresh remake the activity report and display the information into map
You can view activity of your child by analyzing the available coordinates
Long press and open the most recent child\'s coordination on apps like Google,Uber.etc
You can move the map to your own location and check where you are now
You can conveniently move the map to active child current location
the box shows the legend map
you can select child or add child.Long press to view child info
You can swipe to right from corner to open navigation and access other function.You can also reassign the missing permissions from there
